product_name: ExOfficio ExO JavaTech Polo Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Stay fresh, stylish and ready for anything with the classic ExOfficio ExO JavaTech(TM) Polo Shirt. It's great for those times when you need a put-together look but still want performance. Cotton/recycled polyester fabric provides superior odor and moisture control; recycled coffee grounds in the fibers pull perspiration away from skin for quick evaporation. With a UPF 15 rating, fabric provides good protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Hidden stash pocket in the bottom hem holds small items. Closeout.
short_description: Stay fresh, stylish and ready for anything with the classic ExOfficio ExO JavaTech(TM) Polo Shirt. It's great for those times when you need a put-together look but still want performance.
